issue.title: cv_bridge exception when using any vehicle with depth camera (RGBD)

content.raw: I did a bisection search through previous commits and found that the error message started printing in revision 2428 when the bridge\_logger was introduced. I also found that the error statement can be suppressed by commenting out \(not launching\) the bridge\_logger node in subt\_ros/launch/competition\_init.launch.
content.html: I did a bisection search through previous commits and found that the error message started printing in revision 2428 when the bridge_logger was introduced. I also found that the error statement can be suppressed by commenting out (not launching) the bridge_logger node in subt_ros/launch/competition_init.launch.
